data.text: @CDCofBC Seeing as they don't actually prevent the spread of aerosol particles, how about we just stop the RIDICULOUS MANDATES?
@CDCofBC If bad for environment why you sticking them in our face 24/7
@CDCofBC Throw them in the garbage? Shouldn't they be bio hazardous waste for the deadliest pandemic in 100 years that required the shutdown of our human rights and business's ? /s
@CDCofBC The most upstream solution to this social ill is to just stop wearing them.
